foreignData.text: Wenn Du 10 Lebenspunkte oder weniger hast und der Opalene Rächer eine Verzauberung ist, wird der Opalene Rächer zu einer 3/5 Kreatur, die als Wächter zählt.

name: Opal Avenger
originalText: When you have 10 life or less, if Opal Avenger is an enchantment, Opal Avenger becomes a 3/5 creature that counts as a Guardian.

rulings.text: When it turns into a creature, it is no longer an enchantment.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text: When you have 10 or less life, if Opal Avenger is an enchantment, Opal Avenger becomes a 3/5 Soldier creature.
